answers.answer: That is due to your liver problem. If you drink too much give up and consult neurological

It is possible that you have high blood pressure.  My now-deceased husband told me that's how he felt before he got treatment for it.  Also, it's possible that you have low blood sugar; I have diabetes and if I let my sugar get too low (by not eating regularly), my insides feel really shaky.  Another thing to consider is nerves.  I have anxiety problems and sometimes feel like this.Hope this helps.  At any rate, you should consult your primary care physician.  Good luck!
